channel.title: Squarespace website coding - auto play video, drop shadows, parallax, etc
channel.description:
[quote] Hello,
I found you through squarespace specialists. I just made a new site for my company and am not as web savvy as I'd like and need css coding or coding in general and there are a few things I would like to have done and wanted to get a quote.
Here is my website: www.helloairbot.com
I am using the template horizon and I am hosting my videos through wistia. I need code done to get my cover video to auto play upon page load. It's currently in a gallery and you have to press the play button. It will auto play with a code block but I need code for the block to stretch like the video currently looks in the gallery. My old site I was using the shift template for the parallaxing pages but I wanted the one page scroller so horizon seemed to be the perfect fit.
So what I need is custom code to make my cover video auto play in the code block size I need. I would like to get a couple of my pages to parallax and I want some drop shadow on some of my pictures/pages as well. I would also like to get the hover overlays with the titles of my videos like the site below as well. ----------->www.motionstate.com is a site that has the parallaxing and drop shadow, and graphic hover elements I want.
If you could give me a quote on how much you would charge to make these changes to my site happen I would greatly appreciate it.
Thanks so much! [/quote]

item.title: Squarespace website coding - auto play video, drop shadows, parallax, etc
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Cool, that reminds me of Lily. Gadgets I'd like to play with, but have no real use for (yet)!

Please, if you haven't, do read www.cregox.com/your-home (there's also a link for a few codes on the botton, including background videos).

Adding an auto play to the video could be something as simple as adding this code:

$('div.video-fill img').click()

But, with this, I would remove the video sound, at least by default. It's just about setting it in wistia. Makes for better UX.

All the rest is quite more complicated and I would have to dig deeper. Looks like you want many customizations and so it might worth considering going with the developer platform.

In any case, I can work on all of it starting with U$321.

Read full topic
item.source: Squarespace website coding - auto play video, drop shadows, parallax, etc
